title: 1B/1B 1280SQ FT LIVONIA, MI NICELY UPDATED CONDO READY TO MOVE IN!
posting_body: 1B/1B 1280SQ FT LIVONIA, MI NICELY UPDATED CONDO READY TO MOVE IN!
Enter your private entrance and enjoy the newer carpet and open, airy living room with tons of natural light!
Kitchen has all new SS appliances and garbage disposal.
The large dining room is perfect for entertaining.
The master bedroom is private and spacious, with a doorwall to your private enclosed balcony with park views.
The laundry room has extra space for storage.
Great club house is within walking distance with heated pool, work out room, library, sitting room and much more.
Close to Laurel Park Mall, many restaurants
